channel.title: David Anderson
channel.description: Recent news about David Anderson, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Southwest Booster
item.description:
Chaplin celebrates grand opening of new water treatment plant
Chaplin Mayor Kyle Salikin tours Cypress Hillsâ€”Grasslands MP David Anderson, and Thunder Creek MLA Lyle Stewart through Chaplin's new $1.3 million water treatment plant during an official opening ceremony on Aug. 1. Published on August 7, 2013.

item.title: Mentioned by Southwest Booster
item.description:
Anderson and Stewart rave over first year of Marketing Freedom
Saskatchewan Agriculture Minister Lyle Stewart along with MP David Anderson, Parliamentary Secretary Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food for the Canadian Wheat Board, are trumpeting the one-year anniversary of Marketing Freedom. Both attended a ...

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:

item.title: Spoke in the House
item.description:
on Motions for Papers
Mr. Speaker, I ask that all notices of motions for the production of papers be allowed to stand.

item.title: Spoke in the House
item.description:
on Government Response to Petitions
Mr. Speaker, pursuant to Standing Order 36(8), I have the honour to table, in both official languages, the government's response to four petitions.

item.title: Spoke in the House
item.description:
on Questions Passed as Orders for Returns
Mr. Speaker, if questions nos. 1326, 1327, 1328, 1329, 1330 and 1331 could be made orders for return, these returns would be tabled immediately.
